fire

public void fire(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 position,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 direction,
                 Teamable source)
Fires the weapon from the given position with the weapon's given offset, in the given direction. The source is for determine which team the fired projectile belongs to.

Specified by:
fire in interface Weapon
Parameters:
position - The initial position where the projectile should be added.
direction - The direction of the projectile.
source - The Teamable that should be used by the projectile.
